name: Temporal
description:
Command one of four armies in turn based strategy battles
To recover the Temporal, an ancestral stone capable of bending time and space, your hero needs to master his special power and take advantage of artifacts he encounters on the battlefield to defeat his enemies in their universes.

- 4 races (each with a special power) and their universes
- 45 levels
- 3 types of ancient artifacts
- 2 players local versus
